result1={h 52.075820487027904 {f 156.57498173256172 {g 255.71797916466275}}}
% set heat [makeHeat list $max]
c d e
a b
c d e
% set res [runHeat $heat]
{e 114.81072437707834} {c 138.31492547798666} {d 258.95250852170983}
% linkHeat res
% lappend result1 [lindex $res 0]
{h 52.075820487027904 {f 156.57498173256172 {g 255.71797916466275}}} {e 114.81072437707834 {c 138.31492547798666 {d 258.95250852170983}}}
% set heat [makeHeat list $max]
a b

a b
% set res [runHeat $heat]
{a 15.896403703790346} {b 170.8570496043456}
% linkHeat res
% lappend result1 [lindex $res 0]
{h 52.075820487027904 {f 156.57498173256172 {g 255.71797916466275}}} {e 114.81072437707834 {c 138.31492547798666 {d 258.95250852170983}}} {a 15.896403703790346 {b 170.8570496043456}}
% llength $res
1
% set res
{a 15.896403703790346 {b 170.8570496043456}}
% llength $result1
3
% set result2 $result1  
{h 52.075820487027904 {f 156.57498173256172 {g 255.71797916466275}}} {e 114.81072437707834 {c 138.31492547798666 {d 258.95250852170983}}} {a 15.896403703790346 {b 170.8570496043456}}

% set r4 [runHeat $result2]
{a 15.896403703790346 {b 170.8570496043456}} {h 52.075820487027904 {f 156.57498173256172 {g 255.71797916466275}}} {e 114.81072437707834 {c 138.31492547798666 {d 258.95250852170983}}}
% llength $r4



% set ll {a b c d}
a b c d
% lset ll {end end+1} [lpop l]
can't read "l": no such variable
% lset ll {end end+1} [lpop ll]
a b {c d}
% lset ll {end end+1} [lpop ll]
a {b {c d}}


% linkHeat result2
% set result2
{h 52.075820487027904 {e 114.81072437707834 {a 15.896403703790346 {b 170.8570496043456}}}}

% set max 3
3
% source gl2.tcl
compare a .3 b .5 = '-1'
% set heat [makeHeat list $max]
f g h
a b c d e
f g h
% set res [runHeat $heat]
{h 5.106468035423415 {}} {f 157.60722917393187 {}} {g 204.7007262728646 {}}
% linkHeat res
% set res

% lindex $heat 0
f 157.60722917393187 {{g 204.7007262728646 {}}}
% set res [runHeat $heat]
{c 24.408271361332513 {{d 129.81676991554758 {{e 230.4519706081841 {}}}} {a 137.51334116678376 {{b 186.72499013446503 {}}}}}} {f 157.60722917393187 {{g 204.7007262728646 {}}}}
% llength $heat
2
% linkHeat heat
% set heat
{f 157.60722917393187 {{g 204.7007262728646 {}} {c 24.408271361332513 {{d 129.81676991554758 {{e 230.4519706081841 {}}}} {a 137.51334116678376 {{b 186.72499013446503 {}}}}}}}}
% llength $heat
1
% rename compareHorses ""
% proc compareHorses {a b} {
    set timeA [lindex $a 1]
    set timeB [lindex $b 1]
    set val [expr {
        ($timeA < $timeB) ? -1 :
        ($timeA > $timeB) ?  1 :
        ([lindex $a 0] < [lindex $b 0]) ? -1 : 1}]
    puts "compareHorses a='[lindex $a 0]' AND b='[lindex $b 0]' timeA='$timeA',timeB='$timeB'"
    return $val
}
% set res $res2
{h 5.106468035423415 {{f 157.60722917393187 {{g 204.7007262728646 {}}}} {c 24.408271361332513 {{d 129.81676991554758 {{e 230.4519706081841 {}}}} {a 137.51334116678376 {{b 186.72499013446503 {}}}}}}}}
% set list2 [lindex $res 0 2]
{f 157.60722917393187 {{g 204.7007262728646 {}}}} {c 24.408271361332513 {{d 129.81676991554758 {{e 230.4519706081841 {}}}} {a 137.51334116678376 {{b 186.72499013446503 {}}}}}}
%
